channel.title: Atomic Pkz (Everytime in Development) [Skillcape Emotes]
channel.description:
[CENTER] [size=18pt]Check images and all and tell what could I improve :)[/size]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2we9mk9.gif[/img]
[size=5][B][COLOR=SeaGreen]WEBCLIENT[/COLOR][/B] Fat Cookies: you may not post your webclient. please use the server status for that.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/zlc7c3.gif[/img] [IMG]http://atomicpkz.net84.net/advert.png[/img]
We are back, online and better than ever, working on client and server everyday so we have updates at least every week.
[B][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][COLOR=red][SIZE=4][URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T4Aj6EUseAQ"] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/qs6rg0.jpg[/img] [/URL] [/SIZE][/COLOR][/FONT][/B]
[SIZE=5][COLOR=Sienna][U][B]STAFF LIST:[/B][/U][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[B][COLOR=DarkRed]Owner[/COLOR][/B] -Xaves
[COLOR=SeaGreen][B]Co-Owner[/B][/COLOR] -Mika
[COLOR=Yellow][B]Admins[/B][/COLOR] (none)
[COLOR=Silver][B]Mods[/B][/COLOR] -Submission -Kr3w Kid
[COLOR=MediumTurquoise][SIZE=4][B]You can get a position here, just dont ask..[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
For me, Battlescape 317 is the best release in Server Section since I joined this community. Its extremely easy to code and has awesome features for a base. Only downside of this release is the fact that people continue hosting it without do shit on it (little reference to leechers xD).
[COLOR=Sienna][SIZE=5][U][B]Features/Updates[/B][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[I](Note that I'm only listing here some features I added)[/I]
[B][COLOR=Orange]Server[/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*]Clan Chat Online/Offline Status [*]Agility (2 courses, using events, no process) [*]Firemaking (simple system) [*]All special attacks fixed [*]Enchanted bolts random special effects [*]Barrows remade [*]Pest Control fixed [*]Accurate Combat lvl formula [*]Edited some quests and added "The Great Brain Robbery" [*]Most skill menus showing [*]New training areas (2xEasy, 2xMedium, 1xHard) [*]Impling followers [*]Farming(nor finished)[/ul]
[B][COLOR=Orange]Client[/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*]A lot of new interfaces including: Attack interfaces Equipment tab + screen 474 Prayer Interface[I](100% working serve***ide)[/I] New magic Interfaces Clan Chat remade Friend+Ignore slightly edited Opions tab Emote tab Minigames teleport interface [*]Gameframe Changer [I](::459(soon), ::474, ::508)[/I] [I]updates:[/I] Tab area Chat area Chat buttons Minimap Orbs [*]Run Button updating Options tab one [*]Orbs filling and blinking [*]Hp bar toggle button on Options tab [*]Magic spells outlining [*]Auto Cache Updater [*]New 474/508 Maps and Objects [*]5 backgrounds instead of 1 [*]Page Down Key takes Screenshots [*]Mod, Admin, Donator, Co-owner and Owner Crowns [*]A lot of updated npcs, items and emotes[/ul]
[COLOR=Sienna][SIZE=5][U][B]Why only Webclient?[/B][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR]
At the moment I'm not giving a downloadable client although you can get client.jar here wich is completely runnable without html code: [URL=http://www.atomicpkz.net84.net/508_low.jar]http://www.atomicpkz.net84.net/508_low.jar[/URL] or [URL=http://www.atomicpkz.net84.net/508_high.jar]http://www.atomicpkz.net84.net/508_high.jar[/URL] (it says 508 because it starts with 508 gameframe as default). Webclient is way better because I can update client everytime I want, without a single download needed to players.
[B][I]Time for some Media![/I][/B]
[B]Some new interfaces[/B]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vyqm86.jpg[/img][/SPOILER]
[B]Awesome Agility[/B] (no process)
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ra7sbq.gif[/img]
[B]Blitz + Dds :p[/B]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/x6d7bo.jpg[/img]
[B]Specials [/B](since everyone shows this..)
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1ifq4h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2nvtk1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/ml6mpy.jpg[/img]
[B]New training areas[/B]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/rvc6xk.jpg[/img]
[B]Warriors guild[/B]
(only 1 minigame atm)
[[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/144bax4.jpg[/img]
[B]Pest Control[/B]
(need to remake rewards interface)
[SPOILER=" "][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/15miogx.jpg[/img]
[B][SIZE=4]Atomic Pkz Godwars!![/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2z5sjo1.jpg[/img]
[B]Armadyl[/B]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/s2bm68.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/f9lht.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2h2nlea.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/29axqir.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/34zdthx.jpg[/img]
[B]Saradomin[/B]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/s1pwma.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/35hnyp0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/s3znh3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/14bufwn.jpg[/img]
[B]Bandos[/B]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/r1lw08.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/5zqvfa.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/34rf246.jpg[/img]
[B]Zamorak[/B]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/33c56ao.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/vmx3eh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ab5kdy.jpg[/img]
[B]HighScores[/B] (off atm)
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2gxdydx.jpg[/img]
[B]Magic Outlines[/B]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2gx39sz.jpg[/img]
[B]All Elegant Clothes[/B]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/fohttf.jpg[/img]
[B]All skillcapes, including Quest Cape[/B]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/xbe6xh.png[/img][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/f04nm.png[/img]
[B]Auto Cache Updater!![/B]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/281g080.jpg[/img]
[B]Attack Interfaces[/B]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/o6cvfb.gif[/img]
[B]Ingame GameFrame Changer[/B]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/vg0kn9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/280338o.jpg[/img]
[B]New HP bar and button on options tab to switch them[/B]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ta3aev.png[/img]
[B]100% Run button[/B]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/33b22yg.jpg[/img]
[B]Mini Games Teleport[/B]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2prig4o.jpg[/img]
This is the client configs menu that runs at startup (I'm showing this on downloadable client but its also on webclient)
This way its not needed 2 pages.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1192b6q.jpg[/img]
I already added these items on a donator shop, this means they are the only ones that can buy them but they can sell them to all players.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/iz96yd.jpg[/img]
Also I'm adding new 525/562 updated models/objects/animations that you can choose at client configuration, this is a really simple preview of 525 stand anims while i was ingame:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/rkvmdc.jpg[/img]
Also, the first player getting 99 mining (Pro Jadder): (sorry for low quality)
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14wat8x.jpg[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Atomic Pkz (Everytime in Development) [Skillcape Emotes]
item.dc:creator: @atomicmopar atomicmopar
item.description:
@atomicmopar wrote:

[CENTER]
[size=18pt]Check images and all and tell what could I improve :)[/size]

[size=5][COLOR=SeaGreen]WEBCLIENT[/COLOR]
Fat Cookies: you may not post your webclient. please use the server status for that.


We are back, online and better than ever, working on client and server everyday so we have updates at least every week.

[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][COLOR=red][SIZE=4] [/SIZE][/COLOR][/FONT]

[SIZE=5][COLOR=Sienna]STAFF LIST:[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR=DarkRed]Owner[/COLOR]
-Xaves

[COLOR=SeaGreen]Co-Owner[/COLOR]
-Mika

[COLOR=Yellow]Admins[/COLOR]
(none)

[COLOR=Silver]Mods[/COLOR]
-Submission
-Kr3w Kid

[COLOR=MediumTurquoise][SIZE=4]You can get a position here, just dont ask…[/SIZE][/COLOR]

For me, Battlescape 317 is the best release in Server Section since I joined this community. Its extremely easy to code and has awesome features for a base. Only downside of this release is the fact that people continue hosting it without do shit on it (little reference to leechers xD).

[COLOR=Sienna][SIZE=5]Features/Updates[/SIZE][/COLOR]

(Note that I’m only listing here some features I added)

[COLOR=Orange]Server[/COLOR]

[ul][]Clan Chat Online/Offline Status
[]Agility (2 courses, using events, no process)
[]Firemaking (simple system)
[]All special attacks fixed
[]Enchanted bolts random special effects
[]Barrows remade
[]Pest Control fixed
[]Accurate Combat lvl formula
[]Edited some quests and added “The Great Brain Robbery”
[]Most skill menus showing
[]New training areas (2xEasy, 2xMedium, 1xHard)
[]Impling followers
[*]Farming(nor finished)[/ul]

[COLOR=Orange]Client[/COLOR]

[ul][]A lot of new interfaces including:
Attack interfaces
Equipment tab + screen
474 Prayer Interface(100% working serve**ide)
New magic Interfaces
Clan Chat remade
Friend+Ignore slightly edited
Opions tab
Emote tab
Minigames teleport interface
[]Gameframe Changer (::459(soon), ::474, ::508)
updates:
Tab area
Chat area
Chat buttons
Minimap
Orbs
[]Run Button updating Options tab one
[]Orbs filling and blinking
[]Hp bar toggle button on Options tab
[]Magic spells outlining
[]Auto Cache Updater
[]New 474/508 Maps and Objects
[]5 backgrounds instead of 1
[]Page Down Key takes Screenshots
[]Mod, Admin, Donator, Co-owner and Owner Crowns
[*]A lot of updated npcs, items and emotes[/ul]

[COLOR=Sienna][SIZE=5]Why only Webclient?[/SIZE][/COLOR]

At the moment I’m not giving a downloadable client although you can get client.jar here wich is completely runnable without html code: http://www.atomicpkz.net84.net/508_low.jar or http://www.atomicpkz.net84.net/508_high.jar
(it says 508 because it starts with 508 gameframe as default).
Webclient is way better because I can update client everytime I want, without a single download needed to players.

Time for some Media!

Some new interfaces

vyqm86.jpg730×949
[/SPOILER]

Awesome Agility
(no process)

Blitz + Dds

Specials (since everyone shows this…)



New training areas

rvc6xk.jpg508×578

Warriors guild

(only 1 minigame atm)

[

Pest Control

(need to remake rewards interface)

[SPOILER=" "]

15miogx.jpg497×702

[SIZE=4]Atomic Pkz Godwars!![/SIZE]

Armadyl



2h2nlea.jpg763×503

29axqir.jpg763×503

34zdthx.jpg763×503

Saradomin



s3znh3.jpg716×425

Bandos



Zamorak



ab5kdy.jpg763×503

HighScores
(off atm)

2gxdydx.jpg856×458

Magic Outlines

All Elegant Clothes

All skillcapes, including Quest Cape

Auto Cache Updater!!

Attack Interfaces

Ingame GameFrame Changer

vg0kn9.jpg775×533

280338o.jpg768×532

New HP bar and button on options tab to switch them

ta3aev.png487×503

100% Run button

Mini Games Teleport

This is the client configs menu that runs at startup (I’m showing this on downloadable client but its also on webclient)

This way its not needed 2 pages.

1192b6q.jpg772×532

I already added these items on a donator shop, this means they are the only ones that can buy them but they can sell them to all players.

Also I’m adding new 525/562 updated models/objects/animations that you can choose at client configuration, this is a really simple preview of 525 stand anims while i was ingame:

Also, the first player getting 99 mining (Pro Jadder):
(sorry for low quality)

14wat8x.jpg750×376

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
